DC CODE § 29-606.03

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: If a partner's dissociation results in a dissolution and winding up of the partnership business, subchapter VIII of this chapter shall apply; otherwise, subchapter VII of this chapter applies.
The partner's right to participate in the management and conduct of the partnership business terminates, except as otherwise provided in § 29- 608.03;
The partner's duty of loyalty under § 29-604.04(b)(3) terminates; and

The partner's duty of loyalty under § 29-604.04(b)(1) and (2) and duty of care under § 29-604.04(c) continue only with regard to matters arising and events occurring before the partner's dissociation, unless the partner participates in winding up the partnership's business pursuant to § 29- 608.03.
